metrics.name: Number of systems in analysis
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(DISTINCT "kpiIns_ID")

metrics.name: Completion Score
metrics.signalFragment: AVG(CASE WHEN "COMPLETION_CNT" = 'TRUE' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100

metrics.name: Purchase order items without purchase requisition reference
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("3 - Info - Purchase order items without purchase requisition reference") * 100

metrics.name: Purchase order items blocked
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Purchase order items blocked") * 100

metrics.name: Purchase order items deleted
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Purchase order items deleted") * 100

metrics.name: Purchase order items waiting for approval
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Purchase order items waiting for approval") * 100

metrics.name: Purchase order items approved
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("3 - Info - Purchase order items approved") * 100

metrics.name: Purchase order items rejected
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Purchase order items rejected") * 100

metrics.name: Open purchase order items where first required component quantity exceeds subcontracting stock
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Open purchase order items where first required component quantity exceeds subcontracting stock") * 100

metrics.name: Open purchase order items with first component not issued according to plan
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Open purchase order items with first component not issued according to plan") * 100

metrics.name: Open purchase order items overdue for delivery
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Open purchase order items overdue for delivery") * 100

metrics.name: Purchase order items with partial goods receipt
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Purchase order items with partial goods receipt") * 100

metrics.name: Purchase order items with canceled goods receipt
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Purchase order items with canceled goods receipt") * 100

metrics.name: Goods receipt created later than planned
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Goods receipt created later than planned") * 100

metrics.name: Purchase order items with goods receipt into quality inspection
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Purchase order items with goods receipt into quality inspection") * 100

metrics.name: Purchase order items with inspection lot from goods receipt
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Purchase order items with inspection lot from goods receipt") * 100

metrics.name: Purchase order items with inspection lot with outstanding stock posting
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Purchase order items with inspection lot with outstanding stock posting") * 100

metrics.name: Invoice receipt created before goods receipt
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Invoice receipt created before goods receipt") * 100

metrics.name: Purchase order items with partial invoice receipt
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Purchase order items with partial invoice receipt") * 100

metrics.name: Purchase order items with canceled invoice receipt
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Purchase order items with canceled invoice receipt") * 100

metrics.name: Goods receipts created (completion rate)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("STEP - Goods receipts created") * 100

metrics.name: Goods receipts created (total lead time)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("4 - Lead time from start - Goods receipts created")

metrics.name: Supplier invoices created (completion rate)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("STEP - Supplier invoices created") * 100

metrics.name: Supplier invoices created (total lead time)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("4 - Lead time from start - Supplier invoices created")

metrics.name: Create purchase order item in dialog
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Create purchase order item in dialog')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Create purchase order item from SAP SCM
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Create purchase order item from SAP SCM')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Convert purchase requisition items into  purchase order item
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Convert purchase requisition items into  purchase order item')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Create purchase order item via BAPI interface or function module
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Create purchase order item via BAPI interface or function module')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Create purchase order item automatically
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Create purchase order item automatically')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Create purchase order item via other means
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Create purchase order item via other means')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Assign purchase requisition to purchase order item
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Assign purchase requisition to purchase order item')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Approve purchase order
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Approve purchase order')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Release purchase order without approval
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Release purchase order without approval')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Release Purchase Order item via other means
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Release Purchase Order item via other means')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Post goods receipt into unrestricted-use stock
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Post goods receipt into unrestricted-use stock')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Post goods receipt into quality inspection stock
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Post goods receipt into quality inspection stock')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Post goods receipt into blocked stock
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Post goods receipt into blocked stock')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Post goods receipt - others
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Post goods receipt - others')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Post invoice receipt for purchase order
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Post invoice receipt for purchase order')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100
